name: Digital Painting Files of Beautiful Works of Art A
description:
This item is for one digital painting which will be emailed to you as digital image file for you to print at home or at your local print shop. 

This is available worldwide, eliminates shipping charges and enables you to print as many copies as you want, and at whatever size you want

To see the full range and to order a Digital Painting go to www.etsy.com/shop/fotostarArt

name: Beautiful Digital Painting A4 Prints created from Your Photographs (UK only)
description:
I paint unique works of art from the digital photographs that you provide

To order a Digital Painting go to www.etsy.com/shop/fotostarArt

I can create beautiful portraits even from group photos 

Note: the sample portrait is not for sale, but are to illustrate how I can transform your photos

You are not restricted to portraits however, although they are very popular, I can use any of your favourite photographs. Have a look around the rest of the shop for ideas.

You simply supply a digital copy of any of your favourite photograph(s) and I use it to create a work of art.

It does not even need to be a perfect photo.
For landscapes and buildings it’s the composition that is important. 
For portraits, it is the expressions and poses that are important. 

I can select part of your photo, such as one person from a group shot or even rearrange the people in the photograph (see illustration, last two pictures). Just let me know who you’d like to be used from the image. (include a sketch if necessary, do NOT mark on the photo)

__________________________________________________

This item is for a unique work of art which will be printed on 190gsm matte paper and posted to you. (no frame, no digital file)

If you intend using a frame with a card insert (border) we need to know the size of the window opening (eg 7 x 9 inches).

You will be sent a watermarked image(s) for your approval (as can be seen in the sample images here). Once approved you will be sent the image with the water marks removed.

A watermark appears as faint text across the painting. I use the word Ruyalar which is Turkish for Dreams. This is also used to sign each painting.

If you prefer a different print size please just email me, the price will probably be the similar

These are currently available in the UK only

name: Beautiful Digital Painting files created from Your Photographs - AVAILABLE WORLDWIDE
description:
Digital Paintings from Your Photographs

I can paint unique works of art from the digital photographs that you provide. 

To order a Digital Painting go to www.etsy.com/shop/fotostarArt

Note: the sample portrait is not for sale, but are to illustrate how I can transform your photos.

I can create beautiful portraits even from group photos (see illustrations in etsy shop)

You are not restricted to portraits however, although they are very popular, I can use any of your favourite photographs. Have a look around the rest of the shop for ideas.

You simply supply a digital copy of any of your favourite photograph(s) and I use it to create a work of art.

It does not even need to be a perfect photo.
For landscapes and buildings it’s the composition that is important. 
For portraits, it is the expressions and poses that are important. 

I can select part of your photo, such as one person from a group shot or even rearrange the people in the photograph. Just let me know who you’d like to be used from the image. (include a sketch if necessary, do NOT mark on the photo)

__________________________________________________

This item is for a unique work of art which will be emailed to you as digital image file for you to print at home or at your local print shop. 

This saves on shipping charges and enables you to print as many copies as you want, at whatever size you want

You will be sent a watermarked image(s) for your approval (as can be seen in the sample images here). Once approved you will be sent the image with the water marks removed.

A watermark appears as faint text across the painting. I use the word Ruyalar which is Turkish for Dreams. This is also used to sign each painting.
___________________________________________________

I recommend printing on Matte paper
